explanation: Funds are required to be realigned from the Artillery Propellants, Fuzes and Primers, All program to the Artillery Projectile, 155MM, All Types program for proper execution on the correct line for the procurement of replacement artillery projectiles, 155MM, all types provided to the Government of Ukraine. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

Funds are available for realignment from the mortar systems program to support the proper |,execution of replacement of M2A1 mounts transferred to Ukraine in support of the Patriot battery requirement. This is a congressional special interest item. This is emergency budget funding.
